query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Validation report of reduced renovation cost and time
result.description: Findings and recommendations for optimisation of targeted achievement: Cost reduction of at least 15% compared with a typical renovation (i.e. a renovation that meets current minimum requirements of existing building regulations [Definition of typical renovation is based on each countryâ€™s implementation of Art. 4 of the EPBD]); Reduction in time needed for renovation by a factor of 2 at least compared to typical present day renovation.
